verses.verse: ALEPH. <S%H835>Blessed<s%> are the <S%H8549>undefiled<s%> in the <S%H1870>way,<s%> who <S%H1980>walk<s%> in the <S%H8451>law<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
<S%H835>Blessed<s%> are they that <S%H5341>keep<s%> his <S%H5713>testimonies,<s%> and that <S%H1875>seek<s%> him with the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H3820>heart.<s%>
They <S%H637>also<s%> <S%H6466>do<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5766>iniquity:<s%> they <S%H1980>walk<s%> in his <S%H1870>ways.<s%>
You have <S%H6680>commanded<s%> us to <S%H8104>keep<s%> your <S%H6490>precepts<s%> <S%H3966>diligently.<s%>
O that my <S%H1870>ways<s%> were <S%H3559>directed<s%> to <S%H8104>keep<s%> your <S%H2706>statutes!<s%>
<S%H227>Then<s%> shall I not be <S%H954>ashamed,<s%> when I have <S%H5027>respect<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H4687>commandments.<s%>
I will <S%H3034>praise<s%> you with <S%H3476>uprightness<s%> of <S%H3824>heart,<s%> when I shall have <S%H3925>learned<s%> your <S%H6664>righteous<s%> <S%H4941>judgments.<s%>
I will <S%H8104>keep<s%> your <S%H2706>statutes:<s%> O <S%H5800>forsake<s%> me not <S%H3966>utterly.<s%>
BETH. <S%H4100>Wherewithal<s%> shall a <S%H5288>young<s%> man <S%H2135>cleanse<s%> his <S%H734>way?<s%> by taking <S%H8104>heed<s%> thereto according to your <S%H1697>word.<s%>
With my <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%> have I <S%H1875>sought<s%> you: O let me not <S%H7686>wander<s%> from your <S%H4687>commandments.<s%>
Your <S%H565>word<s%> have I <S%H6845>hid<s%> in my <S%H3820>heart,<s%> that I might not <S%H2398>sin<s%> against you.
<S%H1288>Blessed<s%> are you, O <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> <S%H3925>teach<s%> me your <S%H2706>statutes.<s%>
With my <S%H8193>lips<s%> have I <S%H5608>declared<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4941>judgments<s%> of your <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>
I have <S%H7797>rejoiced<s%> in the <S%H1870>way<s%> of your <S%H5715>testimonies,<s%> as much as in <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1952>riches.<s%>
I will <S%H7878>meditate<s%> in your <S%H6490>precepts,<s%> and have <S%H5027>respect<s%> to your <S%H734>ways.<s%>
I will <S%H8173>delight<s%> myself in your <S%H2708>statutes:<s%> I will not <S%H7911>forget<s%> your <S%H1697>word.<s%>
GIMEL. <S%H1580>Deal<s%> <S%H1580>bountifully<s%> with your <S%H5650>servant,<s%> that I may <S%H2421>live,<s%> and <S%H8104>keep<s%> your <S%H1697>word.<s%>
<S%H1540>Open<s%> you my <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> that I may <S%H5027>behold<s%> <S%H6381>wondrous<s%> things out of your <S%H8451>law.<s%>
I am a <S%H1616>stranger<s%> in the <S%H776>earth:<s%> <S%H5641>hide<s%> not your <S%H4687>commandments<s%> from me.
My <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H1638>breaks<s%> for the <S%H8375>longing<s%> that it has to your <S%H4941>judgments<s%> at <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H6256>times.<s%>
You have <S%H1605>rebuked<s%> the <S%H2086>proud<s%> that are <S%H779>cursed,<s%> which do <S%H7686>err<s%> from your <S%H4687>commandments.<s%>
<S%H1556>Remove<s%> from me <S%H2781>reproach<s%> and <S%H937>contempt;<s%> for I have <S%H5341>kept<s%> your <S%H5713>testimonies.<s%>
<S%H8269>Princes<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> did <S%H3427>sit<s%> and <S%H1696>speak<s%> against me: but your <S%H5650>servant<s%> did <S%H7878>meditate<s%> in your <S%H2706>statutes.<s%>
Your <S%H5713>testimonies<s%> also are my <S%H8191>delight<s%> and my <S%H6098>counsellors.<s%>
My <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H1692>sticks<s%> to the <S%H6083>dust:<s%> <S%H2421>quicken<s%> you me according to your <S%H1697>word.<s%>
I have <S%H5608>declared<s%> my <S%H1870>ways,<s%> and you <S%H6030>heard<s%> me: <S%H3925>teach<s%> me your <S%H2706>statutes.<s%>
Make me to <S%H995>understand<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> of your <S%H6490>precepts:<s%> so shall I <S%H7878>talk<s%> of your <S%H6381>wondrous<s%> works.
My <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H1811>melts<s%> for <S%H8424>heaviness:<s%> <S%H6965>strengthen<s%> you me according to your <S%H1697>word.<s%>
<S%H5493>Remove<s%> from me the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H8267>lying:<s%> and <S%H5414>grant<s%> me your <S%H8451>law<s%> <S%H2603>graciously.<s%>
I have <S%H977>chosen<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H530>truth:<s%> your <S%H4941>judgments<s%> have I <S%H7737>laid<s%> before me.
I have <S%H1692>stuck<s%> to your <S%H5715>testimonies:<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> put me not to <S%H954>shame.<s%>
I will <S%H7323>run<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> of your <S%H4687>commandments,<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> you shall <S%H7337>enlarge<s%> my <S%H3820>heart.<s%>
HE. <S%H3384>Teach<s%> me, O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> of your <S%H2706>statutes;<s%> and I shall <S%H5341>keep<s%> it to the <S%H6118>end.<s%>
Give me <S%H995>understanding,<s%> and I shall <S%H5341>keep<s%> your <S%H8451>law;<s%> yes, I shall <S%H8104>observe<s%> it with my <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H3820>heart.<s%>
Make me to <S%H1869>go<s%> in the <S%H5410>path<s%> of your <S%H4687>commandments;<s%> for therein do I <S%H2654>delight.<s%>
<S%H5186>Incline<s%> my <S%H3820>heart<s%> to your <S%H5715>testimonies,<s%> and not to <S%H1215>covetousness.<s%>
<S%H5674>Turn<s%> away my <S%H5869>eyes<s%> from <S%H7200>beholding<s%> <S%H7723>vanity;<s%> and <S%H2421>quicken<s%> you me in your <S%H1870>way.<s%>
<S%H6965>Establish<s%> your <S%H565>word<s%> to your <S%H5650>servant,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> is devoted to your <S%H3374>fear.<s%>
<S%H5674>Turn<s%> away my <S%H2781>reproach<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H3025>fear:<s%> for your <S%H4941>judgments<s%> are <S%H2896>good.<s%>
<S%H2009>Behold,<s%> I have <S%H8373>longed<s%> after your <S%H6490>precepts:<s%> <S%H2421>quicken<s%> me in your <S%H6666>righteousness.<s%>
VAU. Let your <S%H2617>mercies<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> also to me, O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> even your <S%H8668>salvation,<s%> according to your <S%H565>word.<s%>
So shall I have with <S%H1697>which<s%> to <S%H6030>answer<s%> him that <S%H2778>reproaches<s%> me: for I <S%H982>trust<s%> in your <S%H1697>word.<s%>
And <S%H5337>take<s%> not the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H571>truth<s%> <S%H3966>utterly<s%> out of my <S%H6310>mouth;<s%> for I have <S%H3176>hoped<s%> in your <S%H4941>judgments.<s%>
So shall I <S%H8104>keep<s%> your <S%H8451>law<s%> <S%H8548>continually<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%> and <S%H5703>ever.<s%>
And I will <S%H1980>walk<s%> at <S%H7342>liberty:<s%> for I <S%H1875>seek<s%> your <S%H6490>precepts.<s%>
I will <S%H1696>speak<s%> of your <S%H5713>testimonies<s%> also <S%H5048>before<s%> <S%H4428>kings,<s%> and will not be <S%H954>ashamed.<s%>
And I will <S%H8173>delight<s%> myself in your <S%H4687>commandments,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I have <S%H157>loved.<s%>
My <S%H3709>hands<s%> also will I <S%H5375>lift<s%> up to your <S%H4687>commandments,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I have <S%H157>loved;<s%> and I will <S%H7878>meditate<s%> in your <S%H2706>statutes.<s%>
<S%H2142>Remember<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> to your <S%H5650>servant,<s%> on <S%H834>which<s%> you have caused me to <S%H3176>hope.<s%>
<S%H2063>This<s%> is my <S%H5162>comfort<s%> in my <S%H6040>affliction:<s%> for your <S%H565>word<s%> has <S%H2421>quickened<s%> me.
The <S%H2086>proud<s%> have had me <S%H3966>greatly<s%> in <S%H3887>derision:<s%> yet have I not <S%H5186>declined<s%> from your <S%H8451>law.<s%>
I <S%H2142>remembered<s%> your <S%H4941>judgments<s%> of <S%H5769>old,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> and have <S%H5162>comforted<s%> myself.
<S%H2152>Horror<s%> has <S%H270>taken<s%> <S%H270>hold<s%> on me because of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> that <S%H5800>forsake<s%> your <S%H8451>law.<s%>
Your <S%H2706>statutes<s%> have <S%H1961>been<s%> my <S%H2158>songs<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of my <S%H4033>pilgrimage.<s%>
I have <S%H2142>remembered<s%> your <S%H8034>name,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> in the <S%H3915>night,<s%> and have <S%H8104>kept<s%> your <S%H8451>law.<s%>
<S%H2063>This<s%> I <S%H1961>had,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> I <S%H5341>kept<s%> your <S%H6490>precepts.<s%>
CHETH. You are my <S%H2506>portion,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> I have <S%H559>said<s%> that I would <S%H8104>keep<s%> your <S%H1697>words.<s%>
I <S%H2470>entreated<s%> your <S%H6440>favor<s%> with my <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H3820>heart:<s%> be <S%H2603>merciful<s%> to me according to your <S%H565>word.<s%>
I <S%H2803>thought<s%> on my <S%H1870>ways,<s%> and <S%H7725>turned<s%> my <S%H7272>feet<s%> to your <S%H5713>testimonies.<s%>
I made <S%H2363>haste,<s%> and <S%H4102>delayed<s%> not to <S%H8104>keep<s%> your <S%H4687>commandments.<s%>
The <S%H2256>bands<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> have <S%H5749>robbed<s%> me: but I have not <S%H7911>forgotten<s%> your <S%H8451>law.<s%>
At <S%H2676>midnight<s%> <S%H3915><s%> I will <S%H6965>rise<s%> to give <S%H3034>thanks<s%> to you <S%H5921>because<s%> of your <S%H6664>righteous<s%> <S%H4941>judgments.<s%>
I am a <S%H2270>companion<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> them that <S%H3372>fear<s%> you, and of them that <S%H8104>keep<s%> your <S%H6490>precepts.<s%>
The <S%H776>earth,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> is <S%H4390>full<s%> of your <S%H2617>mercy:<s%> <S%H3925>teach<s%> me your <S%H2706>statutes.<s%>
You have <S%H6213>dealt<s%> <S%H2896>well<s%> with your <S%H5650>servant,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> according to your <S%H1697>word.<s%>
<S%H3925>Teach<s%> me <S%H2898>good<s%> <S%H2940>judgment<s%> and <S%H1847>knowledge:<s%> for I have <S%H539>believed<s%> your <S%H4687>commandments.<s%>
<S%H2962>Before<s%> I was <S%H6031>afflicted<s%> I <S%H7683>went<s%> <S%H7683>astray:<s%> but <S%H6258>now<s%> have I <S%H8104>kept<s%> your <S%H565>word.<s%>
You are <S%H2896>good,<s%> and do <S%H2895>good;<s%> <S%H3925>teach<s%> me your <S%H2706>statutes.<s%>
The <S%H2086>proud<s%> have <S%H2950>forged<s%> a <S%H3576>lie<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> me: but I will <S%H5341>keep<s%> your <S%H6490>precepts<s%> with my <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H3820>heart.<s%>
Their <S%H3820>heart<s%> is as <S%H2954>fat<s%> as <S%H2459>grease;<s%> but I <S%H8173>delight<s%> in your <S%H8451>law.<s%>
It is <S%H2896>good<s%> for me that I have been <S%H6031>afflicted;<s%> that I might <S%H3925>learn<s%> your <S%H2706>statutes.<s%>
The <S%H8451>law<s%> of your <S%H6310>mouth<s%> is <S%H2896>better<s%> to me than <S%H505>thousands<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> and <S%H3701>silver.<s%>
Your <S%H3027>hands<s%> have <S%H6213>made<s%> me and <S%H3559>fashioned<s%> me: give me <S%H995>understanding,<s%> that I may <S%H3925>learn<s%> your <S%H4687>commandments.<s%>
They that <S%H3373>fear<s%> you will be <S%H8056>glad<s%> when they <S%H7200>see<s%> me; <S%H3588>because<s%> I have <S%H3176>hoped<s%> in your <S%H1697>word.<s%>
I <S%H3045>know,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> that your <S%H4941>judgments<s%> are <S%H6664>right,<s%> and that you in <S%H530>faithfulness<s%> have <S%H6031>afflicted<s%> me.
Let, I <S%H4994>pray<s%> you, your <S%H2617>merciful<s%> <S%H2617>kindness<s%> be for my <S%H5162>comfort,<s%> according to your <S%H565>word<s%> to your <S%H5650>servant.<s%>
Let your tender <S%H7356>mercies<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> to me, that I may <S%H2421>live:<s%> for your <S%H8451>law<s%> is my <S%H8191>delight.<s%>

Let the <S%H2086>proud<s%> be <S%H954>ashamed;<s%> for they dealt <S%H5791>perversely<s%> with me <S%H8267>without<s%> a <S%H8267>cause:<s%> but I will <S%H7878>meditate<s%> in your <S%H6490>precepts.<s%>
Let those that <S%H3373>fear<s%> you <S%H7725>turn<s%> to me, and those that have <S%H3045>known<s%> your <S%H5713>testimonies.<s%>
Let my <S%H3820>heart<s%> be <S%H8549>sound<s%> in your <S%H2706>statutes;<s%> that I be not <S%H954>ashamed.<s%>
CAPH. My <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H3615>faints<s%> for your <S%H8668>salvation:<s%> but I <S%H3176>hope<s%> in your <S%H1697>word.<s%>
My <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H3615>fail<s%> for your <S%H565>word,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H4970>When<s%> will you <S%H5162>comfort<s%> me?
For I am <S%H1961>become<s%> like a <S%H4997>bottle<s%> in the <S%H7008>smoke;<s%> yet do I not <S%H7911>forget<s%> your <S%H2706>statutes.<s%>
<S%H4100>How<s%> many are the <S%H3117>days<s%> of your <S%H5650>servant?<s%> <S%H4970>when<s%> will you <S%H6213>execute<s%> <S%H4941>judgment<s%> on them that <S%H7291>persecute<s%> me?
The <S%H2086>proud<s%> have <S%H3738>dig<s%> <S%H7882>pits<s%> for me, <S%H834>which<s%> are not after your <S%H8451>law.<s%>
<S%H3605>All<s%> your <S%H4687>commandments<s%> are <S%H530>faithful:<s%> they <S%H7291>persecute<s%> me <S%H8267>wrongfully;<s%> <S%H5826>help<s%> you me.
They had <S%H4592>almost<s%> <S%H3615>consumed<s%> me on <S%H776>earth;<s%> but I <S%H5800>forsook<s%> not your <S%H6490>precepts.<s%>
<S%H2421>Quicken<s%> me after your loving <S%H2617>kindness;<s%> so shall I <S%H8104>keep<s%> the <S%H5715>testimony<s%> of your <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>
For <S%H5769>ever,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> your <S%H1697>word<s%> is <S%H5324>settled<s%> in <S%H8064>heaven.<s%>
Your <S%H530>faithfulness<s%> is to all <S%H1755>generations:<s%> you have <S%H3559>established<s%> the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and it <S%H5975>stays.<s%>
They <S%H5975>continue<s%> this <S%H3117>day<s%> according to your <S%H4941>ordinances:<s%> for <S%H3605>all<s%> are your <S%H5650>servants.<s%>
<S%H3884>Unless<s%> your <S%H8451>law<s%> had been my <S%H8191>delights,<s%> I should <S%H227>then<s%> have <S%H6>perished<s%> in my <S%H6040>affliction.<s%>
I will <S%H5769>never<s%> <S%H3808><s%> <S%H7911>forget<s%> your <S%H6490>precepts:<s%> for with them you have <S%H2421>quickened<s%> me.
I am yours, <S%H3467>save<s%> me: for I have <S%H1875>sought<s%> your <S%H6490>precepts.<s%>
The <S%H7563>wicked<s%> have <S%H6960>waited<s%> for me to <S%H6>destroy<s%> me: but I will <S%H995>consider<s%> your <S%H5713>testimonies.<s%>
I have <S%H7200>seen<s%> an <S%H7093>end<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H8502>perfection:<s%> but your <S%H4687>commandment<s%> is <S%H3966>exceeding<s%> <S%H7342>broad.<s%>
MEM. O <S%H4100>how<s%> I <S%H157>love<s%> your <S%H8451>law!<s%> it is my <S%H7881>meditation<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>day.<s%>
You through your <S%H4687>commandments<s%> have made me <S%H2449>wiser<s%> than my <S%H341>enemies:<s%> for they are <S%H5769>ever<s%> with me.
I have more <S%H7919>understanding<s%> than <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H3925>teachers:<s%> for your <S%H5715>testimonies<s%> are my <S%H7881>meditation.<s%>
I <S%H995>understand<s%> more than the <S%H2204>ancients,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> I <S%H5341>keep<s%> your <S%H6490>precepts.<s%>
I have <S%H3607>refrained<s%> my <S%H7272>feet<s%> from <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H734>way,<s%> that I might <S%H8104>keep<s%> your <S%H1697>word.<s%>
I have not <S%H5493>departed<s%> from your <S%H4941>judgments:<s%> for you have <S%H3384>taught<s%> me.
